unnormalised: Bore, mhozo contractor, Rajubhai mhanta mhaka bathroomak "200 sq ft" tiles zai mhunn. Punn mhoji baiko sangta tem lagbag "18.58 square meters" asa mhunn. Konn sarko? Ek gutâ€™tachi 'Maths for Dummies' class Rajubhain mazo thavn lipoun dovorlea? Ani to sodanch "Rs/sq ft," ashi kimot sangta, zaleaar tile shop-antlo monis mat "Rs/sq meter" sangta. Maka dista mhaka ek unit converter zai zo fluent Gujarati ulouta.
normalised: Barobar, mhuzo contractor, Rajubhai mhanta mhakka mhaje bathroomak donshi square feet tiles zai mhunn. Punn mhaji bail shapat gheun sangta ki atthara point panch ashtt square meters lagtele mhunn. Konn sarke sangta? Kitem tori 'Maths for Dummies' class asa Rajubhai mazo lagun lipoun dovortat? Ani to sodankal rupees per square foot-an kimmat sangtat, zalear tile shop-antlo monis rupees per square meter-an sangta. Maka dista ki maka ek unit converter zai zaka fluent Gujarati yetta.

unnormalised: Ani magir cement asa. Taka "50 kg" cement zai, ani maka dista mhojea living room-ant ek lhan dongor astolo mhunn. Tem eka lhan bathroomak poros sarke zalear zalem? Nimnnea vellar hanv "5kg" tandullachi bag uchlovnk vetlom tedna maka pattuch duklolem. Konnen tori sanga he construction valean maka ullu banounk na! Mhojem brain ISRO poros chodd calculations korta.
normalised: Ani cementacho ulo asa. Tanka panchash kilogram zai, ani maka dista ki mazo living room-an ek lhan dongor zatlo mhunn. Tem reasonable asa ek lhan bathroomak? Shevttak jevhan hanvem panch kilogram tandullacho bag ukhlun pollounk prayatn kelo, hanvem mhaji fatt modli. Konn tori maka sanga he construction waley mazo lagun khelant nant mhunn! Mazo brain I-S-R-O-chea poros chodd calculations korta.

unnormalised: Ani reta vishim mhaka sangonkuch naka. Dislem mhunn "1 cubic meter" ret mhaka zai. Atam, hanv architect nhoi, punn tem mhojea bathroomant ek lhan Goa bandunk poros purment zatolem mhunn dista. Ami sarke asat ki to maka sangankuch na punn beach theme-chem renovation korunk yojana korta?
normalised: Ani revo vishayan sangonakai. Apparently, maka ek cubic meter revo zai. Hanv architect nant, punn tem dista ki tem puro zatel mazo bathroomak lhan Goa bandunk. Ame sarke sangta ki to beach-themed renovation korunk sodta mazo sangona?

unnormalised: Gambhirponnan, maka hem soglle somzunk zai ani mhojea bathroomant sogllench ret ani cementacho dongor astolo. Konney hem measurements bodol korunk vo Rajubhai mazo pay ucholun dovorla he vishim sanglear upkar zatolo!
normalised: Seriously punn, maka hem samzonk zai mazo bathroom sampurn revacho ani cementacho dongor mazo living room-an zaina. Konui insights he measurements convert korunk ani Rajubhai mazo payn uddoyta ki nant mhunn sangat zalear upkar zatle!
